item.title: 英伟达认为中国市场对 H200 需求强劲，供应充足
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）表示，中国客户对 H200 芯片的需求强劲，特朗普政府已表示将考虑让芯片制造商向中国发货。【原文：Nvidia Corp. said it has seen strong demand from customers in China for the H200 chip that the Trump administration has said it will consider letting the chipmaker ship to that country.】

item.title: 英国首席财务官对人工智能促进企业发展越来越乐观
item.description: 超过半数的英国公司财务主管预计人工智能将促进经济增长，这表明人们对该技术改变经济的潜力越来越乐观。【原文：More than half of British companies’ finance chiefs expect artificial intelligence to deliver a growth boost, in a sign of rising optimism over the technology’s potential to transform the economy.】

item.title: 英国零售商协会（BRC）称，英国食品通胀加快，购物者再次受到打击
item.description: 英国零售商协会（British Retail Consortium）称，上个月英国食品通胀率自 8 月份以来首次出现上升，这促使购物者在零售商的关键圣诞交易期寻找物美价廉的商品。【原文：UK food inflation rose for the first time since August last month, the British Retail Consortium said, nudging shoppers to seek value items during the key Christmas trading period for retailers.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台，委内瑞拉债券持有人抱团取暖，偿债希望渺茫
item.description: 周一，委内瑞拉债券价格飙升，该国的一些长期债权人聚集在一起，讨论美国总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗下台将如何影响他们收回对委内瑞拉约 600 亿美元违约债务的部分投资。【原文：As prices on Venezuela’s bonds soared Monday, a group of the country’s longtime creditors huddled to discuss how the US ouster of President Nicolas Maduro will affect their ability to recoup some of their investment in about $60 billion of Venezuela’s defaulted debt.】

item.title: 英特尔展示卷土重来的核心新电脑
item.description: 英特尔公司展示了基于全新设计的处理器的笔记本电脑，这是该芯片制造商为使其产品重新具有竞争力所做努力的一部分。【原文：Intel Corp. showed off laptop computers based on processors with a new design, part of the chipmaker’s effort to make its products competitive again.】

item.title: 一周来最大涨幅后保持稳定，委内瑞拉成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了委内瑞拉的前景，同时对全球供应过剩的担忧持续存在，石油在创下一周最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest gain in a week as traders weighed the outlook for Venezuela, while concerns about a global glut persisted.】

item.title: 交易商将目光从委内瑞拉风险转向美国数据，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商将目光从委内瑞拉的紧张局势转向美国一系列繁忙的经济数据，黄金走势平稳。【原文：Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond tensions in Venezuela toward a busy lineup of economic data in the US.】

item.title: 博思格钢铁提出 88 亿美元收购要约后股价大涨
item.description: 博思格钢铁有限公司（BlueScope Steel Ltd. ）股价在悉尼大涨，此前该公司表示正在考虑美国钢铁制造商钢铁动力公司（Steel Dynamics Inc.【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd. shares surged in Sydney, after the company said it was considering a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover bid by US steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd.】

item.title: 戴尔重推 XPS 笔记本电脑，高管称 PC 部门 "偏离了轨道
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.）的一位高层管理人员表示，PC 业务 "有点偏离了轨道"，该公司在去年停产了广受好评的 XPS 笔记本电脑品牌后，将重新推出该品牌。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. is bringing back its well-regarded XPS laptop brand after discontinuing it last year, as a top executive said the PC business had “gotten a bit off course.”】

item.title: 人工智能视频生成引领中国瓜子股价大涨 84
item.description: 很少有大公司能像瓜子二手车这样迅速向人工智能转型。【原文：Few major companies have tried to pull off a pivot to AI as swiftly as Kuaishou Technology.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称新鲁宾芯片已步入正轨，将帮助加速人工智能发展
item.description: Nvidia 公司备受期待的 Rubin 数据中心新产品今年即将发布，客户很快就能试用该技术，从而帮助加快人工智能的发展。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s highly anticipated new Rubin data center products are nearing release this year and customers will soon be able to try out the technology, helping speed AI development.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望延续创纪录的全球涨势：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周二开盘上涨，延续了全球股市创纪录的高位，原因是投资者对地缘政治的担忧有所淡化，纷纷抢购科技股。黄金、石油和国债均攀升。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a positive open Tuesday, extending a record high for global equities as investors looked past geopolitical concerns to snap up tech stocks. Gold, oil and Treasuries all climbed.】

item.title: 对冲基金选股大年，光大证券涨幅达 37
item.description: Light Street Capital Management 去年飙升超过 37%，表现优于其他选股型对冲基金，并在 2021 年和 2022 年大幅亏损后为投资者挽回了损失。【原文：Light Street Capital Management soared more than 37% last year, outperforming other stock-picking hedge funds, and making investors whole following steep losses in 2021 and 2022.】

item.title: 数据中心为美国大电网的电力保障增加 65 亿美元投资
item.description: 与美国最大电网相连的数据中心刚刚又增加了 65 亿美元的电力供应采购成本，这加剧了人们对人工智能热潮正在加剧能源通胀的担忧。【原文：Data centers tied to the biggest US grid just tacked on another $6.5 billion to the cost of procuring power supplies, adding to concerns that the AI boom is worsening energy inflation.】

item.title: 稳定币银行初创公司 Kontigo 将在黑客攻击后向客户退款
item.description: 专注于拉丁美洲的银行业初创公司 Kontigo 周一在一份 X 声明中表示，黑客攻击事件影响了 1,000 多名客户价值约 340,905 美元的稳定币，该公司计划向这些客户赔偿损失。【原文：Latin America-focused banking startup Kontigo plans to reimburse more than 1,000 customers after a hack that affected some $340,905 worth of their stablecoins, the company said in an X statement on Monday.】

item.title: 马杜罗上台让马哈石油委内瑞拉项目成为焦点
item.description: 瑞典能源公司马哈资本（Maha Capital）拥有委内瑞拉一个濒临破产的石油项目的开采权，在尼古拉斯-马杜罗上台后，该公司正在考虑建立合作伙伴关系，以便向外国投资开放该行业。【原文：Maha Capital, a Swedish energy company with rights to a languishing oil project in Venezuela, is considering partnerships after Nicolas Maduro’s capture could open the industry to foreign investment.】

item.title: 英伟达发布面向自动驾驶汽车和机器人的新人工智能工具
item.description: Nvidia 公司宣布推出一组人工智能模型和工具，旨在加快自动驾驶汽车的开发，并为新一代机器人提供动力，以扩大其技术的覆盖范围。【原文：Nvidia Corp., aiming to extend the reach of its technology, announced a group of AI models and tools designed to speed the development of autonomous vehicles and power a new generation of robots.】

item.description:

item.title: 对冲基金在马杜罗被捕前加大石油看涨押注
item.description: 在美国抓捕委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的前一周，对冲基金将原油看涨押注推高至11月以来的最高水平，因为市场对即将对南美国家实施陆上打击的猜测不断升温。【原文：Hedge funds boosted bullish bets on crude to the most since November in the week before the US capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro as markets weighed mounting speculation over imminent land strikes on the South American country.】

item.title: 巴西金融科技公司 PicPay 申请美国 IPO，Claure 将参与投资
item.description: 亿万富翁巴蒂斯塔家族投资控股公司旗下的巴西移动银行应用程序 PicPay 已向美国提交首次公开募股申请，该公司在 2025 年前九个月的利润增长了 79%。【原文：PicPay, the Brazilian mobile banking app owned by the billionaire Batista family’s investment holding company, has filed for a US initial public offering showing a 79% increase in profit in the first nine months of 2025.】

item.title: 威斯特公司将以 40 亿美元收购美国大型天然气车队
item.description: Vistra Corp. 同意以约 40 亿美元的现金和股票收购美国东北部和德克萨斯州的 10 家天然气发电厂，从而为这家电力供应商在快速增长的电力市场提供额外的发电能力。【原文：Vistra Corp. agreed to buy 10 natural gas-fired plants in the US northeast and in Texas for about $4 billion in cash and stock, giving the electricity supplier additional generation capacity in fast-growing power markets.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Shiprock 在最新一次新兴市场招聘中聘用了 Converium 的 Cura
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Shiprock Capital Management 雇用了纳迪尔-库拉（Nadir Cura），这家总部位于伦敦的对冲基金正在扩充其新兴市场专家名册。【原文：Shiprock Capital Management hired Nadir Cura as the London-based hedge fund builds up its roster of emerging-market specialists, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者因利率风险和利润疲软从澳大利亚撤资
item.description: 随着投资者将资金转向全球热门市场，澳大利亚资产的回撤正在加速，这些市场的回报前景远远超过国内的低迷前景。【原文：A pullback from Australian assets is accelerating as investors shift capital toward hot markets globally that promise returns far outpacing muted prospects at home.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯连续第三个月下调亚洲旗舰油价
item.description: 在市场持续出现供应过剩迹象的情况下，沙特阿拉伯连续第三个月下调了对亚洲的旗舰原油价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia dropped the price of its flagship crude grade to Asia for a third month amid persistent signs of oversupply in the market.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行将所持阿尔法银行股份转为直接持股 29.8%
item.description: 总部位于米兰的意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）周一在一份声明中说，该行将其在希腊贷款机构阿尔法银行（Alpha Bank SA）的合成持股转换为实际股份，使其直接持股和投票权达到约 29.8%。【原文：UniCredit SpA converted its synthetic holding in Greek lender Alpha Bank SA into actual shares, bringing its direct stake and voting rights to around 29.8%, the Milan-based bank said in a statement Monday.】

item.title: 马杜罗被推翻后加拿大重质原油价格疲软
item.description: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗上周末被美军抓获，这一令人震惊的事件已经在美洲，尤其是加拿大的石油市场引起反响。【原文：The shocking capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro over the weekend by US forces is already reverberating across the oil market in the Americas, particularly Canada.】

item.title: 顶级大豆贸易商退出保护亚马逊森林的协议
item.description: 据周一发表的一份声明称，代表全球最大的一些大豆贸易商的一个集团正在退出一项在巴西达成的具有里程碑意义的协议，该协议旨在保护亚马逊地区免遭森林砍伐。【原文：A group representing some of the world’s largest soybean traders is exiting a landmark deal created in Brazil to protect the Amazon against deforestation, according to a statement issued Monday.】

item.title: Belski 离职后，蒙特利尔银行聘请 Trahan 为新投资策略师
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，蒙特利尔银行资本市场部已聘请弗朗索瓦-特拉汉（François Trahan）担任首席投资策略师。【原文：Bank of Montreal’s capital markets unit has hired François Trahan as chief investment strategist, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行抢购 2002 年以来回报率最高的抵押债券
item.description: 由于存款充裕，美国银行正在购买抵押贷款债券，并押注该资产类别将在 2026 年因资本规则放宽而得到进一步推动。【原文：Flush with deposits, US banks are buying up mortgage bonds and betting that the asset class will get a further boost in 2026 from relaxed capital rules.】

item.title: 亚马逊称 "周四橄榄球之夜 "收视率最高
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）表示，刚刚结束的周四晚间橄榄球赛是该节目 20 年历史上收视率最高的一次。【原文：The recently ended Thursday Night Football season was the most watched ever in the 20-year history of the program, Amazon.com Inc. said.】
